entry.data:
SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 20 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
